snippet: Blinding snow squalls, high winds and a slick highway led to a milelong series of crashes in Detroit that left at least three people dead, including a 7-year-old boy and 9-year-old girl.
lead_paragraph: Blinding snow squalls, high winds and a slick highway led to a milelong series of crashes in Detroit that left at least three people dead, including a 7-year-old boy and 9-year-old girl.

headline.main: Michigan: Three Dead in Chain of Crashes
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Three Dead In Chain of Crashes
